title: IN PICTURES: Vulcan open day at Southend Airport
content:
AIRCRAFT fans got a chance to look round one of the most vivid Cold War planes at Southend Airport . 
   
 Share article  
   
Families got the chance to climb into the cockpit and met volunteers from the Vulcan Restoration Trust, who lovingly look after the aircraft. 
 
Visitors also got a chance to learn about the aircraft’s history, which was armed with nuclear weapons, when it was in operational use.
